001._comment: Interacting with the pile of bricks near the left
001.name: Sky
001.text: (Some papers under these bricks that are still a little legible.)

002.name: Sky
002.text: (“Company bulletin: Anyone found complaining about the rumbling under the floor and/or hearing voices of ancient spirits warning of doom will be subject to disciplinary action.”)

003.name: Sky
003.text: (“Remember, we want a happy and friendly workplace environment!”)
